card_text: When you take damage from your opponent's card effect or their monster's attack: Apply the appropriate effect based on the type of damage.$N●Battle: Special Summon 1 monster from your GY, with ATK less than or equal to the damage, and if you do, end the Battle Phase after the Damage Step.$N●Effect: Inflict double the damage you took to your opponent.$NYou can only activate 1 "Split Mirror of the Underworld" per turn.
